meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Dentaria, typically having toothed leaves.
meanings.sent1: The toothworts in the garden have leaves with jagged edges.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy studying the different types of toothworts found in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The toothworts in the field seemed to be smiling with their sharp leaves.
meanings.sent4: The toothworts stood out in the meadow like little green saws.
meanings.sent5: The toothworts, with their toothed leaves, looked like miniature hedgehogs.

meanings.definition: Plants of the genus Dentaria collectively.
meanings.sent1: We admired the colorful toothworts covering the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The toothworts bloomed beautifully in the springtime.
meanings.sent3: The toothworts whispered secrets to each other in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The toothworts danced in the wind, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The toothworts painted the ground with their vibrant hues.
